::Cygnar::
       "As tempting as that sounds, I have an alternate plan.  I propose that 
we strike at their base whilst they are assaulting the Tripred base.  I 
suggest that I temporarily relocate to the Tripred base and my troops, such 
as they are, will defend along with the Tripreds.  Meanwhile, you, Rodimus, 
will have to lead the Maximals against the Predacon base then, when they have 
no where left to run, catch flank their forces by coming in behind them."  He 
glances at his fellow leaders.  "What do you say?"

--part1_a4.2e45affc.2ae766f8_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
